actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Hearings held.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Committee consideration and Mark Up Session held.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered favorably reported an original bill (S. 2572) in lieu of this measure.

official_title: A bill to provide economic support for the Agreement Between the Government of Ireland and the Government of the United Kingdom, and for other purposes.
short_title: Northern Ireland and Ireland Assistance Act of 1986

summary.text: Northern Ireland and Ireland Assistance Act of 1986 - Authorizes the use of specified authorities contained in the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to provide support for the Anglo-Irish Agreement signed in November 1985. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1987 for economic assistance for Ireland and Northern Ireland.

titles.title: Northern Ireland and Ireland Assistance Act of 1986
A bill to provide economic support for the Agreement Between the Government of Ireland and the Government of the United Kingdom, and for other purposes.
